title: Praising God as a Family
itunes:author: Guest: Tricia Goyer
itunes:summary:
When life is busy, it's vitally important to remind yourself of God's goodness. But doing so isn't always easy in the midst of parenting. John and Danny discuss people who've inspired them to trust God amidst the big task of raising kids. Featuring Tricia Goyer.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Tricia Goyer's book "The Grumble-Free Year" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-07-22?refcd=1127203

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/praising-god-as-a-family/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
